description: Otoha is the unorthodox mother of Yuuma and Sumomo. She runs the school cafeteria called Oasis. Otoha often does not act her age, but rather she acts closer to her daughter`s age. She is close friends with Minagi Suzuri. This is why Suzuri entrusts her to take care of Yuuma.
name: Kohinata Otoha
